title: Fix mobile horizontal scroll overlap in Weekly Prayer Times table

requirements.text: Fix the mobile weekly prayer times table so that horizontal scrolling does not cause the left Day/Date column text to visually overlap/merge with the time columns; the left column must remain readable and visually separated while scrolling.

quotes: Uygulamada mobilde haftalık namaaz vakitlerinin birkaç sütundan sonra sayfaya sığmıyor yana kaydırmak gerekiyor ancak yana kaydırınca tariflerle çakışıyor zamanlar
sağa bakmak isteyince sol sütündaki gün tarih yazıları ile birbbirine karışıyorr

acceptanceCriteria: On small/mobile widths, the weekly table can be scrolled horizontally inside its own container without affecting other page content.
While horizontally scrolling, the first column (Day/Date) stays visually fixed and does not blend/overlap with adjacent columns; text remains clearly readable.
The sticky first column has an opaque background and a clear divider (border and/or shadow) so underlying scrolled columns do not show through.
The table has a consistent minimum width so columns do not collapse into each other when rendered on narrow screens.

requirements.text: Ensure the Weekly Prayer Times section uses consistent scroll + sticky-column styling for both header and body cells (same z-index layering, background treatment, and separator) to prevent any header/body mismatch during horizontal scroll.

quotes: sol sütündaki gün tarih yazıları ile birbbirine karışıyorr

acceptanceCriteria: The sticky 'Day' header cell and the sticky day/date body cells render with consistent layering and background, with no flicker or overlap during scroll.
No other UI elements in the Home tab overlap the table during horizontal scrolling.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (immutable path); compose or override via consuming components and global styles instead.
Keep changes limited to fixing the weekly table mobile scroll/overlap issue (no unrelated UI copy changes).
nonGoals: Adding new features to the prayer times table (sorting, filtering, export).
Changing data sources or prayer time calculation logic.
